act_pit.actname: North Island-Coast Development Initiative Trust Act

change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "North Island-Coast one-time development allocation" BEFORE amended by 2023-47-108, effective November 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).

bcl:definition.bcl:text: North Island-Coast one-time development allocation means any money paid by the government to the North Island-Coast Development Initiative Trust;

change.changenote: Section 6 (5) (b) BEFORE amended by 2023-47-109, effective November 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the term of office of the replacement director is the remainder of the term of the director he or she replaces.

change.changenote: Section 17 BEFORE renumbered and amended 2017-12-1, effective November 2, 2017 (Royal Assent).

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Limit on the North Island-Coast one-time development allocation
bcl:section.bcl:text: Despite any other enactment, if the government makes North Island-Coast one-time development allocation payments to the North Island-Coast Development Initiative Trust, the total of those payments must not exceed $50 million.

change.changenote: Section 17 (2) was added by 2017-12-1, effective November 2, 2017 (Royal Assent).
Section 17 (1) BEFORE amended by 2023-47-110, effective November 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: Despite any other enactment, if the government makes North Island-Coast one-time development allocation payments to the North Island-Coast Development Initiative Trust, the total of those payments must not exceed $60 million.

change.changenote: Section 20 (1) (e) BEFORE repealed by 2023-47-111, effective November 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).
Section 20 (1) (j) was added by 2023-47-111, effective November 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).
